posts.post_content:
Hello! Looking to add some more t206 portraits to my set. SGC or PSA will work.
Lower/mid grades please 3-4/40-50. USPS money orders work best for me, if that matters. Thank you.

-Ed Walsh
-Roger Bresnahan
-Bobby Wallace
-Jimmy Collins
-Miller Huggins
-Fred Clarke
-Rube Waddell
-Clark Griffith

I have a Keeler portrait, but it isn't graded. I was planning on getting it graded, but I will sell it raw if you are interested.

Jarrett

[quote name="soccersaver97" post=1229710]I have a Keeler portrait, but it isn't graded. I was planning on getting it graded, but I will sell it raw if you are interested.

Jarrett[/QUOTE]

I will always look at ungraded as well. Do you have a scan or picture you could provide?

All messages will be returned by tonight. Had to go out of town for work, so my "free" time is all over the place at the moment. Sorry for any delays in response. Thank you to all that have taken the time to help.
